promptflow.tools.embedding.embedding.name: Embedding
promptflow.tools.embedding.embedding.description: Use Open AI's embedding model to create an embedding vector representing the input text.

promptflow.tools.serpapi.SerpAPI.search.name: Serp API
promptflow.tools.serpapi.SerpAPI.search.description: Use Serp API to obtain search results from a specific search engine.

promptflow.tools.aoai_gpt4v.AzureOpenAI..name: Azure OpenAI GPT-4 Turbo with Vision
promptflow.tools.aoai_gpt4v.AzureOpenAI..description: Use Azure OpenAI GPT-4 Turbo with Vision to leverage AOAI vision ability.
promptflow.tools.aoai_gpt4v.AzureOpenAI..default_prompt:
# system:
As an AI assistant, your task involves interpreting images and responding to questions about the image.
Remember to provide accurate answers based on the information present in the image.

# user:
Can you tell me what the image depicts?
![image]({{image_input}})

promptflow.tools.azure_content_safety.an.name: Content Safety (Text Analyze)
promptflow.tools.azure_content_safety.an.description: Use Azure Content Safety to detect harmful content.

promptflow.tools.openai_gpt4v.OpenAI.cha.name: OpenAI GPT-4V
promptflow.tools.openai_gpt4v.OpenAI.cha.description: Use OpenAI GPT-4V to leverage vision ability.
promptflow.tools.openai_gpt4v.OpenAI.cha.default_prompt:
# system:
As an AI assistant, your task involves interpreting images and responding to questions about the image.
Remember to provide accurate answers based on the information present in the image.

# user:
Can you tell me what the image depicts?
![image]({{image_input}})

promptflow.tools.open_model_llm.OpenMode.name: Open Model LLM
promptflow.tools.open_model_llm.OpenMode.description: Use an open model from the Azure Model catalog, deployed to an AzureML Online Endpoint for LLM Chat or Completion API calls.

promptflow_vectordb.tool.faiss_index_loo.name: Faiss Index Lookup
promptflow_vectordb.tool.faiss_index_loo.description: Search vector based query from the FAISS index file.

promptflow_vectordb.tool.vector_db_looku.name: Vector DB Lookup
promptflow_vectordb.tool.vector_db_looku.description: Search vector based query from existing Vector Database.

promptflow_vectordb.tool.vector_index_lo.name: Vector Index Lookup
promptflow_vectordb.tool.vector_index_lo.description: Search text or vector based query from AzureML Vector Index.

promptflow_vectordb.tool.common_index_lo.name: Index Lookup
promptflow_vectordb.tool.common_index_lo.description: Search an AzureML Vector Index for relevant results using one or more text queries.
